nodes.text: Slimps' eyes were a food available in the galaxy during the time of the New Republic. Thirty crates of the best Slimps' eyes available were purchased in 10 ABY by Orko the H'uun, a member of a low caste of the Hutt species. The crates were served at the wedding feast of his daughter Anachro and the Hutt crime lord, Gorga Desilijic Aarrpo. The feast was incredibly expensive due to the food served.

Slimps' eyes were first mentioned in the comic book Boba Fett: When the Fat Lady Swings, which was written by John Wagner and published in 1996. While the images of the feast that were shown in the comic include many kinds of food, it was not made clear if any of them were supposed to be the eyes.
